info.title: WorkSpan
info.description: WorkSpan is a collaborative platform to plan, execute, and drive revenue with partners. Manage your partner programs and partner initiatives on WorkSpan, and connect seamlessly with internal and partner applications. You can integrate your CRM, Partner Center, Collaboration tools and Productivity tools to WorkSpan.

post.description: Subscribe to various collaboration events such as creates and updates on membership, tasks and comments to drive and enhance communication with your internal and partner network.

field_name.description: WorkSpan field name where the external_id from an external system is stored

Field name of external ID in WorkSpan. If empty, default field name of external id field will be used. Default field names are: opportunity object: 'sales_details.crm_opportunity_id'; Accound object: 'account_info.external_account_id'
Field name of Audit Field in WorkSpan.

integration_id.description: Integration Id (long ID) of related integration

external_id.description: ID from external system (example. CRM Id)

status_code.description: Code representing status of audit request.

message.description: Additional information for recording in audit log
message.example: Successfully created Referral in Partner Center

object_id.description: WorkSpan Object ID (long ID) that was updated

field_name.description: Name of WorkSpan field that was updated
